title: Neural Network Regression
description: In this video I cover how to train a neural network to perform a "regression" task (rather than classification). The result is a continuous numerical output (frequency value) instead of a categorical one (specific note).

codeExamples.title: Neural Network Regression
codeExamples.description: This sketch demonstrates how to train your own neural network to run a regression.

links.description: ml5 page with documentation and supporting material about ml5.neuralNetwork.
